A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Whilst the film was beautifully shot I felt the pacing was a bit jerky and that there was one too many plotlines (two of which could have easily been merged together). The film with the exception of the title crawl and the battle between the millennium falcon and tie fighters\, didn't feel like Star Wars. I also felt lime there was no real consequences\, and that the first order were too incompetent to take seriously. It was entertaining but overall I felt disappointed. I will go and see it for a second and maybe third time and perhaps my opinion will change but as of the first viewing that's it.
